name: Flame
description: A flame that triggers based on the specified conditions.

fields.name: Trigger Variable
fields.description: The local variable number that triggers or activates this flame.

1.name: Jet of Fire (Off)
1.description: A jet of fire, but it is turned off.

2.name: Jet of Fire (When Approaching)
2.description: A jet of fire that activates when approaching.

3.name: Jet of Fire (Time-based)
3.description: A jet of fire that activates based on a time cycle.

6.name: Jet of Fire (Extinguish When Disabled)
6.description: A jet of fire that goes out completely when disabled.
